title: Bug 6304: Unable to synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource, such as a .properties file, in the package viewer, an issue arises.
OB: When selecting a .java file and another resource, synchronization fails to work as expected. The files do not synchronize, and there is no indication of any error or activity.
EB: Upon selecting a .java file and another resource, the synchronization process should successfully update both files, ensuring that changes in one file reflect accurately in the other.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the package viewer.
2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file).
3. Attempt to synchronize the selected files.
4. Observe the lack of synchronization and any error messages.
